ragabhairavi.name: Raga Bhairavi
ragabhairavi.source:

$[5] = 16/15
sort()
label([black, white, black, black, white, black, black, white])

simplify

pythagorean.name: Pythagorean
pythagorean.source:
labeled(['F', 'C', 'G', 'D', 'A', 'E', 'B'], [3^i rdc 2 white for i of [-2..4]])
labeled(['G♭', 'D♭', 'A♭', 'E♭', 'B♭'], [3^i rdc 2 black for i of [-7..-3]])
sort()

young1799.name: Young (1799)
young1799.source:
697.9 white 'C'
700.1 white 'G'
700.1 white 'D'
702.0 white 'A'
701.9 white 'E'
702.0 white 'B'
702.0 black 'F♯'
700.1 black 'C♯'
700.1 black 'G♯'
697.9 black 'D♯'
697.9 black 'A♯'
stack()

1200. 'F'
reduce()
sort()

12edo.name: 12-tone equal temperament
12edo.source:
100. black 'B♭'
200. white 'B'
300. white 'C'
400. black 'C♯'
500. white 'D'
600. black 'E♭'
700. white 'E'
800. white 'F'
900. black 'F♯'
1000. white 'G'
1100. black 'G♯'
1200. white 'A'

partch43.name: Harry Partch 43-tone
partch43.source:
[
 n % d white
  for n of [1..11]
  for d of [1..11]
]

1 gray:15:21:27:33
/1 black:15:21:27:33

5 olive:21:27:81
/5 gold:21:27:81

2
reduce()
sort()
keepUnique()

carlossuperjust.name: Wendy Carlos Super Just
carlossuperjust.source:
[3,5..17]
label([white, yellow, blue, white, lavender, chocolate, yellow, indigo])
1/3 white
3/5 green
5/3 yellow
2 white
reduce()
sort()

gradycentaur.title: Kraig Grady Centaur (7-limit)
gradycentaur.name: Kraig Grady Centaur
gradycentaur.source:
gs(geodiff(12:14 blue:15 yellow:18 white), 10, 2/1 white)
rotate(6)
insert(21/20 cyan)
insert(7/5 cyan)

3/2 white

3/2 white
2/1 white

void(pop($, 11))
simplify

17superpyth12.source:

label(['F', 'C', 'G', 'D', 'A', 'E', 'B', 'F♯', 'C♯', 'G♯', 'D♯', 'A♯'])
sort()
17@
